137514.「我が名は 光導使メナー……\n 我らが主 聖光教主と 交わせし誓いのもと\n:
My name is Light Guide Menna... and under the
oath exchanged with our Lord, the Light Lord,
I lead the fighter <pc>.

137515.「深遠なる意思に導かれ 紡がれし光芒。 \n 幾千もの光芒集いて 束になれば\n:
Guided by a profound will, a beam of light
spun. If thousands of beams of light become
one, they will turn into a holy light.

137516.「聖光よ その大いなる輝きをもって\n この混迷の世界に あまねく降り注ぐ\n:
O Holy Light, with your great radiance, be the
hope that pervades this chaotic world!

137517.「……ふう これでいいわ。それじゃ \n 英知の紋章を 高く かかげてちょうだい:
That's better. Then, hold high the Wisdom
Crest.

137519.「今 聖光を紡ぎし \n 闘戦士 <pc>の 英知のチカラを捧げ\n 次なる道を:
Now, we weave the holy light and devote the
power of the Wisdom of <pc> to open
the way to the next path!
